```
CREATE TABLE numeric_types
(
    type1 int PRIMARY KEY,
    type2 bigint,
    type3 smallint,
    type4 tinyint,
    type5 varint,
    type6 float,
    type7 double,
    type8 decimal
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE text_types
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    type2      text,
    type3      varchar,
    type4      ascii
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE date_types
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    type1      timestamp,
    type2      time,
    type3      date,
    type4      timeuuid,
    type5      duration
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE counter_type
(
    primaryKey uuid PRIMARY KEY,
    type1      counter
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE other_types
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    type1      boolean,
    type2      uuid,
    type3      blob,
    type4      inet
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE collection_types
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    email      set<text>
);
```

```
ALTER TABLE collection_types
    ADD scores list<text>;
```

```
ALTER TABLE collection_types
    ADD address map<uuid, text>;
```

```
CREATE TABLE tuple_type
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    type1 tuple<int, text, float>
);
```

```
CREATE TYPE user_defined_type (
    type1 timestamp,
    type2 text,
    type3 text,
    type4 text);
```

```
CREATE TABLE user_type
(
    primaryKey int PRIMARY KEY,
    our_type   user_defined_type
);
```
